contentrichtext.text: '''ZLT''' is a [[three-letter abbreviation]] with multiple meanings, as described below: * the [[IATA]] code for [[La Tabatière Airport]] in [[La Tabatière, Quebec]], [[Canada]]. * [[Zero length launch]] a system to launch jet fighters. * [[ZeroLine Trader]] http://www.zerolinetrader.com - a ''simple'', ''reliable'' and ''easy to use'' trading platform. * The anti-depressant Zoloft * [[Zeppelin NT|Zeppelin Luftschifftechnik GmbH & Co]], a new company continuing work on [[Zeppelin]]'s funded by the money from the winding-up of the old Zeppelin Company many years earlier. {{disambiguation}}
